document_data.name: Ter-soth
document_data.mainbody: '''Ter-soth''' was a [[balor]] commander in the service of [[Orcus]] in the [[Abyss]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Ter-soth led a regiment of 100 [[glabrezu]]s guarding the conduit to the palace of Orcus. If a powerful enemy attacked, he abandoned his men and fled to the palace asking for reinforcements.
